## Editor Controls {#Editor-Controls-3.2}

<p align="center">
  <img width="" height="" src="https://files.gitbook.com/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F3kS90tLsADGm1ocbe7q9%2Fuploads%2FJOCXTVt329PaiHlLxdDM%2F3.2.webp?alt=media&token=e05ff57b-0114-43e5-851a-2980421d8225">
</p>
<p align=center> Editor Controls</p>

Editor Controls are used to program and edit parameter values for all fixtures as well as create and edit objects such as cues and libraries.
 
 • **[Vibe]** Key (Shift Key)
 
 • Numeric Key Pad § 4 Main encoder push wheels
 
 • Trackball
 
 • **[Next]/[Prev]** Keys
 
 • XYZ lock keys
 
 • **[Res]** Wheel resolution key
 
 • Dedicated dimmer wheel
 
 • Command select keys
 
 • Object select keys
 
 • <span style="color:Gray">Navigation keys</span>

## Motorized Sliders and Qkeys {#Motorized-Sliders-and-Qkeys-3.3}

<p align="center">
  <img width="" height="" src="https://files.gitbook.com/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F3kS90tLsADGm1ocbe7q9%2Fuploads%2FxsWfMbqMqt1HoY8RjkUG%2F3.3.webp?alt=media&token=88f965be-30de-4ae9-bc05-77a7b881cf97"> 
</p>

<p align=center> Motorized Slider and Qkey Controllers</p>

 15 individually paging 60mm Motorized slider potentiometers and 15 individually paging Qkey single button controllers, used to execute and control objects such as: 

• Qlist Cues
 
 • Scenes
 
 • Effects Rate and Size
 
 • Group selects
 
 • Group Masters (Submasters)
 
 • Libraries
 
 • <span style="color:Gray">Macros</span>
 
 • <span style="color:Gray">Snap</span>


## Master Controller and Control Keys {#Master-Controller-and-Control-Keys-3.4}

<p align="center">
  <img width="" height="" src="https://files.gitbook.com/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F3kS90tLsADGm1ocbe7q9%2Fuploads%2FeKxmo9RyqPKPWmOtQUtI%2F3.4.webp?alt=media&token=f13a5178-75d3-4156-8951-e33ff77ddc53"> 
</p>

<p align=center> Master Controller and Control Keys</p>

 • Non-motorized 100mm Sliders, used for Theatrical playback of cues
 
 • Large **[GO/BACK/HOLD]** Keys for executing cues on the Master Controller
 
 • Master Controller **[SELECT]** key
 
 • Controller **[RELEASE]** Key
 
 • **[LOAD]** key to pre-load a controller for execution
 
 • Controller **[FREE]** Key (unload)
 
 • **12 [Controller Keys]** to provide additional or missing functions to controllers.
 
 • **[RATE]** for overall or individual rate override of controllers
 
 • **[TEACH]** for BBM tap time


## Aux Qkeys, Grand Master, and Global Controllers {#Aux-Qkeys-Grand Master-and-Global-Controllers-3.5}

<p align="center">
  <img src="https://files.gitbook.com/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F3kS90tLsADGm1ocbe7q9%2Fuploads%2F0sZ9sO4ZJRnSUlSMY8jv%2F3.5.webp?alt=media&token=35001380-7789-4973-bd6a-e0c6eeeb6edb">
</p>

<p align=center> Aux Qkeys, Grand Master, Blackout, and General Sliders</p>

 • 20 individually paging Auxiliary **Qkey Controllers** for single button execution of Cues, Scenes, Group Selects,   <span style="color:Gray">Snaps and Macros</span>.
 
 • 5 Non-motorized single button Sliders for execution and control of Scenes, Cues, Group Masters (Submasters), <span style="color:Gray">Rate Masters, and Flash Masters</span>.
 
 • Grand Master Slider.
 
 • **[BO]** Blackout key with blackout option.

<p align="center">
  <img src="https://files.gitbook.com/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2F3kS90tLsADGm1ocbe7q9%2Fuploads%2FRmMcKxsyaEiRpBhi3sGs%2F3.5.1.webp?alt=media&token=599ec487-dcbf-42f0-bbb7-4652f10a0390">
</p>

 • **[PATCH] [PROGRAM]** and **[PLAY-B]** Workspace Template keys available for accessing display pages.
 
 • <span style="color:Gray">**[View]**, stores or executes display snapshots.</span>
